plugin.name: resize
plugin._long: A plugin to resize windows by dragging them from any part (not just the edges).

option.name: activate
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag a window to resize it.

option.name: activate_preserve_aspect
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag a window to resize it while perserving its orignal aspect.

option.name: activate_key
option._long: Resize a view using the arrow keys. Press enter or the mouse button to exit.

option.name: keyboard_allow_mouse
option._short: Allow combined mouse and keyboard interaction
option._long: Whether to allow using the mouse if resize was started with the keyboard.

option.name: step
option._long: Change the size by this amount when using the arrow keys.

option.name: client_resize_use_keyboard
option._long: Whether to allow keyboard interaction if resize is initiated by a client view (typically by dragging at the edges).
